item.title: Logging in Messages
item.dc:creator: @lolvengeance lolvengeance
item.description:
@lolvengeance wrote:

hey guys.
on my server i’m making members and non members.
i’ve done a code that makes it say ur position when u sign in , here it is

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("the hidd3n")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Owner & Coder, " +playerName+ " has logged in"; } if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Aeon") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Co-owner, " +playerName+ " has logged in"; } if (playerRights == 2) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Admin, " +playerName+ " has logged in"; } if (playerRights == 1) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Mod, " +playerName+ " has logged in"; } if (playerIsMember == 1) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Member, " +playerName+ " has logged in"; } if (playerIsMember == 0) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Non-Member, " +playerName+ " has logged in"; } }
when i sign in , instead of saying owner and coder it says member, the hidd3n has signed in.
how do i make it that if ur like, owner and coder AND member… it says owner and coder instead?

Read full topic
